entry.title: 23. Medallion Holder, PERSONALIZED Medallion Holder, 12 Coins
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wooden U recover
Type: Gifts
Price: 69.95

Deluxe 12 Slot Recovery Chip Holder 

Proudly display up to 12 of your most cherished recovery chips!  Each of these beautiful chip holder/display plaques features 12 spaces for mounting your special recovery coins. 

"One Day at a Time" is expertly laser engraved at the top of the plaque.  ...a Choices Books & Gifts exclusive!  Nearly any other message or phrase request can be accommodated.  Simply contact us with your special requests!  What a wonderful way to display your recovery tokens!  

The backside of each medallion holder display plaque is "key holed" making it simple to mount flush to any wall, door, or flat surface. Your tokens are held securely in place with the provided mounting tabs.  In addition, each medallion pocket has an access hole drilled all the way through the plaque - making it much easier to remove tokens when/if necessary.  

Material: Alder Wood with Walnut side trim 
Dimensions: Approx. 8 x 10 x 0.75" (thick)
Holder Diameter: 1-3/8" - accommodates standard bronze, plated, & tri-colored medallions. (Medallions not included)

Please note: These are laser engraved plaques.  Text and graphic contrast are subject to the natural characteristics of each individual piece of wood. Yours will be a one-of-a-kind - unlike anyone else's in the world! We do not utilize color fill techniques to increase the darkness/contrast of the engraving - opting instead to allow the beauty of each piece of wood to bring into being a special and unique piece of art for you to treasure for years and years.
Note: For customization you have to put your name and date in order notes!
This is a custom made product that will ship separately.  Please allow 10 business days for shipment.

entry.title: 19. Medallion Holder, 20 Coins w Serenity Prayer PERSONALIZED
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wooden U recover
Type: Gifts
Price: 139.95 - 149.95 (2 variants)

9 x 12 inch 20 Token Serenity Prayer Holder - Display Plaque 

After many requests, we are pleased to offer this lovely, Token Personalized Recovery Medallion Display Plaque.  It features our Serenity Prayer and slots for your favorite recovery medallions. 

A keyhole on the back side of each medallion display plaque makes it simple to mount on the wall, door, or any flat surface. And because we drill a hole entirely through each medallion holder pocket, it's easy to change out your medallions whenever you wish.  Just pop 'em out and mount the new ones with double sided tape!

Material: Alder Wood

Dimensions: 9" x 12" x 0.75" (thick)

Holder Diameter: 1-3/8" - accommodates 20 standard bronze, plated, & tri-colored medallions. (Medallions not included.

Please note: These are laser engraved plaques.  Text and graphic contrast are subject to the natural characteristics of each individual piece of wood. Yours will be a one-of-a-kind - unlike anyone else's in the world! We do not utilize color fill techniques to increase the darkness/contrast of the engraving - opting instead to allow the beauty of each piece of wood to bring into being a special and unique piece of art for you to treasure for years and years.

Note: For customization you have to put your name and date in order notes!
This is a custom made product that will ship separately.  Please allow 10 business days for shipment.
